introduction: In Nazi Germany, young Marie meets a Jewish clown who gives away balloons for the price of a smile. But Marie cannot satisfy Jakob's wish. Through a tragic misunderstanding the situation escalates and for a while it seems as if Marie will have to owe him her smile forever.转自 （http://www.psfilmfest.org/festival/film/detail.aspx?id=18829&FID=26）纳粹时期的德国，小玛丽遇见一位犹太小丑（雅克布），他以别人一个微笑的价格来卖气球。可是玛丽无法满足雅克布的愿望。一串误会之后，事情变得很糟，看来玛丽要一直欠着雅克布这个微笑了。The ChosenThe Chosen74 Minute Running TimeAdditional Countries: Germany, United Kingdom, Israel, USAProgram: The ChosenAn alternately engrossing and entertaining overview of the vast range of Jewish experience, this package of short stories revolving around what it means to be a Jew draws upon family life, history, current events and the Holocaust to etch an indelible portrait of a people who persevere through strength, wisdom and the occasional mitzvah.
